welcome.title: Welcome Tour
welcome.description: Get to know the app features
welcome.step_welcome_desc: Your personal finance companion. Track expenses, manage budgets, and achieve your financial goals with ease.
welcome.step_dashboard_desc: Get a quick overview of your finances with interactive charts and real-time balance tracking.
welcome.step_transactions_desc: Easily add income, expenses, and investments. Use the quick-add button for fast entry.
welcome.step_categories_desc: Create hierarchical categories to organize your spending. Parent and child categories for detailed tracking.
welcome.step_contexts_desc: Tag transactions with contexts like Vacation or Work to analyze spending by life events.
welcome.step_groups_desc: Create groups to split expenses with friends or family. See who owes whom at a glance.
welcome.step_statistics_desc: Explore monthly and yearly statistics with beautiful charts and budget tracking.
welcome.step_offline_desc: Use the app even without internet. Your data syncs automatically when you're back online.

help.title: Help & Guide
help.subtitle: Learn how to use the app and understand how it works.
help.welcome_select: Select a topic from the left to get started.
help.demo_table_hint: Hover over rows to reveal actions
help.actions_intro_desktop: On desktop, you can manage items using the action buttons in the table or context menus.
help.click_edit: Click the pencil icon to modify details.
help.click_delete: Click the trash icon to remove an item.
help.click_more: Click the ellipsis for advanced options like 'Split' or 'Duplicate'.
help.deleting_categories_expl: If you delete a Category used by transactions, they move to 'Uncategorized'. You can easily find them using the 'Uncategorized' filter in the Transactions list.
help.editing_recurring_expl: Changes to a template affect ONLY future transactions. Past history is untouched.
help.logout_expl: Logging out clears local data securely. Ensure you are 'Synced' (Green check) before logging out.
help.offline_expl: The app works fully offline. Changes sync automatically when connection returns.
help.ctx_ex_1: Track vacation spending across Food & Transport.
help.ctx_ex_3: Group costs for specific projects (e.g. Renovation).
help.vs_cat_expl: Categories = 'What' (Food). Contexts = 'Why' (Vacation). One Category per item, multiple Contexts allowed.
help.groups_members_expl: You can invite real users by their ID (they need the app) OR add 'Guests' (virtual users managed by you, no account needed).
help.groups_categories_expl: Groups have their own isolated categories. You must use these specifically for group expenses.
help.groups_owner_expl: The group creator is the 'Owner'. Only they can manage members, invites, and delete the group.
help.groups_splits_expl: When adding an expense, one member pays, but the cost is split according to member 'Quotes' (Shares).
help.pwa_expl: Install as a native app for the best experience.
help.pwa_desktop: Click the install icon in the address bar
help.help_resources_desc: Learn how to use the app to its full potential.
help.recurring_intro: Recurring transactions act as 'Templates' that automatically generate future expenses or income.
help.recurring_auto_gen_expl: The app automatically creates transactions for you based on the frequency (Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly).
help.recurring_templates_expl: The 'Recurring' list shows *Templates*. The 'Transactions' list shows the actual generated items.
help.import_intro: You can import data from various sources to quickly populate your history.
help.import_formats_expl: We support direct import from: Intesa Sanpaolo (XLS), Revolut (CSV), and GoNuts Backups (JSON).
help.import_generic_expl: For other banks, use 'Generic CSV'. You can manually map columns (Date, Amount, Description) to match your file.
help.import_rules_expl: The app learns! Create 'Rules' to automatically categorize future imports. Use 'Skip' to ignore specific transactions (e.g. internal transfers) so they aren't imported.
help.customization_intro: Make the app truly yours by adjusting the appearance.
help.customization_themes_expl: Choose between Light, Dark, or System Sync mode in Settings -> Appearance.
help.customization_colors_expl: Select your favorite color (e.g., Violet, Blue, Orange) to change the app's main highlights.
help.profile_intro: Manage your personal identity and session security.
help.profile_name_expl: Go to 'Profile' to update your Display Name. This name is visible to other members in Groups.
help.profile_hero_desc: Manage your personal identity and preferences.
help.logout_desc_modern: End your session on this device. Local data will be cleared.
help.stats_intro: Visualize your spending habits with interactive charts and historical comparisons.
help.stats_charts_expl: Switch between Pie (Categories) and Bar (Trends) charts. Tap on segments to see detailed breakdowns.
help.stats_metrics_expl: Track Total Spend, Daily Average, and Savings Rate. Toggle between Monthly and Annual views.
help.stats_comparison_expl: Compare current spending vs previous month/year to spot trends and anomalies.
help.budget_intro: Stay on track by setting spending limits.
help.budget_monthly_expl: Set a global spending limit for the month. Monitor your progress from the Dashboard.
help.budget_category_expl: Set specific limits for each category (e.g., Groceries, Transport) to control spending granularly.
help.tips_intro: Learn about smart features and hidden behaviors.
help.tips_visibility_expl: To keep the interface clean, some fields (like Contexts or Budgets) are hidden until you create data for them.
help.groups_intro: Easily manage shared expenses for trips, housemates, or couples.
help.groups_create_expl: Create a group and invite members via link. Any transaction added to the group is split automatically.
help.groups_split_expl: You can customize how the cost is split (Equal, Percentage, or Shares) for each expense.
help.sync_local_expl: Complete functionality even without internet. Data is saved on your device instantly.
help.sync_cloud_expl: When online, data syncs to our secure servers so you can access it from multiple devices.
help.gestures_intro: Speed up your workflow with swipe gestures.
help.demo_swipe_hint: Swipe left to delete, right to edit
help.contexts_intro: Understand the power of multi-dimensional tagging.
help.contexts_vs_cat_expl: Categories are WHAT you buy (e.g. Food). Contexts are WHY or WHERE (e.g. Vacation, Work). Use both for deeper insights.
help.sync_intro: Keep your data synced across all devices.
